verbs.description: President Trump [V: may] be able to add " professional wedding crasher " to his resume after his latest drop - in at a wedding in New Jersey .
[ARG1: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: be] [ARG2: able to add " professional wedding crasher " to his resume after his latest drop - in at a wedding in New Jersey] .
[ARG0: President Trump] may be able to [V: add] [ARG1: " professional wedding crasher "] [ARG2: to his resume] [ARGM-TMP: after his latest drop - in at a wedding in New Jersey] .
